title: LFT Top/Mid/fill with lots of experience looking for a regular flex team plat+
body: LFT Top/Mid laner supportive style looking for a flex team who plays regularly and have a mature attitude towards the game. Currently solo queue P4 with a higher roof. Good in tank duty at top or scaling mids like anivia and kassadin. If you are interested please send me a pm or a comment, thanks.
